definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: lame;—abs. ´[[פ]] 2Sa 9:13 + ; pl. [[פִּסְחִים]] 2Sa 5:6 + ;—as attrib. Le 21:18 (+ [[עִוֵּר]]); pred. 2Sa 19:27, [[שְׁתֵּי רַגְלָיו]] ´[[פ]] 9:13 lame as to both his feet; cf. also (of animal) De 15:21 (+ [[עִוֵּר]]); as subst. 2Sa 5:6, 2Sa 5:8, 2Sa 5:8, Je 31:8, Mal 1:8, Mal 1:13, Job 29:15 (all + [[עִוֵּר]]), also Is 33:23, Is 35:6, Pr 26:7.
